job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning sessions, which is a core aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are traditional software development activities focused on exploring and integrating new technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities with human expertise to enhance a service, fitting the definition of integrating AI into existing systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems, a key aspect of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a pragmatic approach to overcoming challenges without constant supervision.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on the application and integration of AI within a support context (1.A.1), rather than core AI model development or specialized GenAI tasks. The role is about enhancing an existing service with AI, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The distinction between core AI development and applying AI to solve business problems is evident. However, the ad is relatively brief and lacks specific technical tool mentions, which slightly reduces the confidence in a perfect classification.
